chapters.title: Chapter 35: The Right ThingChapter 36: An Invitation
chapters.info: Renaile din Calon Blue Star, p. 557—Former Windfinder to the Mistress of Ships of the Atha'an Miere. After the death of Nesta din Reas, she serves as secretary to Chanelle. She has a dignified look, with white locks among the black.
